name: custom-plugin-cloudflare
description: Enterprise-grade learning system with 65+ career roadmaps and 7 specialist AI agents. Get personalized guidance from foundation to mastery for any tech career path. Production-ready, zero-gap coverage.
longDescription: Comprehensive professional development platform combining 65+ developer career roadmaps from the renowned developer-roadmap.sh community (2M+ users) with 7 specialized AI agents. Each agent provides expert guidance, practical workflows, proven best practices, and real-world examples. Features intelligent skill assessment, personalized learning paths, portfolio project recommendations, and production-grade tools. Perfect for career switchers, junior developers, students, and senior developers exploring new domains.
author: Developer Roadmap Community

agents.name: Core Development Paths
agents.description: Expert guidance for Frontend, Backend, Full Stack, and DevOps career paths with learning sequences, technology stacks, portfolio projects, and career progression frameworks.
agents.shortDesc: Frontend, Backend, Full Stack, DevOps guidance

agents.name: Languages & Frameworks
agents.description: Deep expertise on 9 programming languages (Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, Java, Go, Rust, PHP, C++, Kotlin) and 10+ frameworks. Compare languages, select stacks, master ecosystem-specific patterns.

agents.name: Mobile & Games
agents.description: Specialist in iOS (Swift, SwiftUI), Android (Kotlin, Jetpack Compose), cross-platform (Flutter, React Native), and game development (Unity, Unreal). Master platform-specific optimization and architecture.
agents.shortDesc: iOS, Android, Flutter, Unity, Unreal expertise

agents.name: Data & AI
agents.description: Expert in data engineering, machine learning, deep learning, generative AI, and MLOps. From data pipelines to production ML systems, AI agents, and LLM applications.
agents.shortDesc: Data Engineering, ML, AI, MLOps, LLMs

agents.name: Cloud & Infrastructure
agents.description: Expert in AWS, GCP, Azure, Cloudflare, Docker, Kubernetes, Infrastructure as Code (Terraform), and CI/CD. Build scalable, secure cloud systems and automate infrastructure.

agents.name: Architecture & Security
agents.description: Expert in system design, software architecture, API design, cybersecurity, threat modeling, and compliance. Build secure, scalable systems that pass production scrutiny.

agents.name: Emerging Tech & Leadership
agents.description: Specialist in emerging technologies (prompt engineering, AI agents, AI red teaming) and leadership roles (product manager, engineering manager, DevRel, technical writing, UX design, design systems).
agents.shortDesc: Prompt Engineering, AI Agents, Leadership, DevRel

commands.name: learn
commands.description: Start your personalized learning journey. Get matched with specialist agents and receive custom roadmap based on your goals.

commands.name: browse
commands.description: Browse and explore all 65+ developer roadmaps from developer-roadmap.sh. Find your role and understand learning requirements.

commands.name: assess
commands.description: Assess your current skills across any domain. Identify knowledge gaps and get detailed improvement recommendations.

commands.name: projects
commands.description: Discover portfolio project ideas appropriate for your learning level. Build real-world projects to demonstrate mastery.

skills.name: Core Development
skills.description: Master core development paths: Frontend, Backend, Full Stack, DevOps. Comprehensive learning sequences and production-ready tech stacks.

skills.name: Languages & Frameworks
skills.description: Deep expertise on 9 languages and 10+ frameworks. Compare, select, and master programming languages and their ecosystems.

skills.name: Mobile Development
skills.description: iOS, Android, Flutter, React Native, and game development with Unity and Unreal. Native and cross-platform mobile expertise.

skills.name: Data Engineering
skills.description: Data pipelines, ML models, AI systems, and MLOps. From data collection to production deployment with best practices.

skills.name: Cloud Infrastructure
skills.description: AWS, Kubernetes, Docker, Terraform, and CI/CD pipelines. Build, deploy, and manage cloud-native systems.

skills.name: System Design
skills.description: System design, architecture, API design, security, and compliance. Design production-ready, secure, scalable systems.

skills.name: Emerging Technologies
skills.description: Prompt engineering, AI agents, AI red teaming, and leadership roles. Navigate emerging tech and enable career transitions.

core: 7 specialized AI agents for expert guidance
Personalized learning paths based on goals and experience
Comprehensive skill assessment and progress tracking
Portfolio project recommendations by skill level
Technology stack guidance and comparison tools
advanced: Industry best practices and design patterns
Interactive learning commands with detailed workflows

roadmap.v1.1: Interactive skill assessments with detailed metrics
roadmap.v1.2: Community project showcase and peer learning
roadmap.v2.0: Mobile app and advanced analytics dashboard
